question: Who has been named as the new Prime Minister of Sri Lanka?
explanation: Newly elected Sri Lankan President Gotabaya Rajapaksa on November 20,2019 named his brother Mahinda as Prime Minister, cementing the grip on power of a clan credited with crushing the Tamil Tigers a decade ago. Mahinda, a two-term president himself, is due to be sworn in as premier on November 21 following the resignation of Ranil Wickremesinghe after his party suffered a humiliating defeat at the weekend\'s presidential polls.
